Class NamedScriptEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • scotty.template.NamedScriptEngine

    public class NamedScriptEngine
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    ScriptEngine support wrapper.

        scriptName - the script

    • Method Detail

      • setScriptName

        public void setScriptName(String scriptName)
        Set the script name the engine will be evaluating, used solely to enhance error messages.
        Parameters:

      • put

        public void put(String name,
       Object object)
         throws ScriptException
        Put an object into the languages top level context with an associated name. A way to expose variables.
        Parameters:
        name - The name
        object - the object
        Throws:
        ScriptException - it the object can not be put into the script context

        Throws:
